body_html:
My final thought is to compile the latest version from head, which is where I started. It is entirely possible there was an XLA issue in the 1.1 branch. I would also use CUDA 8. With XLA being experimental I try to stick with the most common settings and the most recent code.

I know this can be frustrating and is why it is still marked as experimental. If I think of anything else I will update this issue.

body:
My final thought is to compile the latest version from head, which is where I started.  It is entirely possible there was an XLA issue in the 1.1 branch.  I would also use CUDA 8.  With XLA being experimental I try to stick with the most common settings and the most recent code.

I know this can be frustrating and is why it is still marked as experimental.  If I think of anything else I will update this issue.
